content: I've been looking into PDex and the core FHIR requirements. I know that PDex builds on US Core, where the $expand operation is a SHOULD. I wanted to see if there were any specific workflows in PDex where $expand becomes important.

Yes, the ValueSet$expand. I know that several value sets are in play for the PDex guide, but I'm trying to track down the specific workflow that would require $expand, or wondering if PDex envisions requiring valueset$expand. Since PDex builds on US Core, I was trying to map all the capabilities from US Core to PDex where relevant.
